Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: Hey! Ready for your first paper route?

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: You should be happy! Not many of your friends have taken up my offer for the paper route...

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: *COUGH* And I couldn't think of a better way to spend an afternoon!

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: You'll see the value of this work one day...

Name: You
Text: You know I'm only doing this because my dad... uhh... doesn't think I'm responsible.

Name: You
Text: It was this or cutting grass. You're just lucky I like riding my bike...

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: *COUGH* Okay, well, I'll give you a few extras. They can be slippery little things.

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: For your first run, you can just head through the backroads. I've only got two customers on that route.

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: Shouldn't take you too long? $5 per paper delivered... Bit of pocket money, eh? *COUGH*

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: Make sure you get home quickly, now!
